about.title: About Tigasatumedika: Knowing Our Vision, Mission and Values
about.description: Find out more about Tigasatumedika. Vision, Mission and Values that we believe in. Take your business to the next level with us!

hero.title: Advancing Indonesian Healthcare with PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama
paragraphs: PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama is a fast growing company engaged in marketing, distribution, and sales of medical equipment. Established in 2017, PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama dedicated advancing the healthcare in Indonesia.

We are bridging medical equipment manufacturers with consumers all over Indonesia. We provide leading-edge services in the healthcare industry through strong partnerships, quality products, and excellent service to deliver the best quality to our customers.

about.faq_subtitle: If you want to know more about payment products, registration, or solutions to problems you are experiencing, we are always ready to help you. Contact us via social media or the chat button on the right. You can also visit our Help Center.

faqs.question: What is Tigasatu Medika Pratama?
faqs.answer: Tigasatu (in short) is an Indonesian medical device distribution company with special focus on cardiology, dentistry and diabetic care technology. Established in 2016, the company has been appointed by some of the world's most prominent principals to distribute their products throughout Indonesia. One of the main reasons foreign principals choose Tigasatu, is our unwavering commitment to transparency, integrity and professionalism.

faqs.question: What products and services does Tigasatu provide?
faqs.answer: Tigasatu (in short) distributes cardiology, dentistry and diabetic care technology products in Indonesia since 2016, providing high quality products at affordable prices in order to promote the development of affodable, high-quality healthcare in Indonesia. We work closely with medical professionals to deepen the public's understanding of the benefits of the medical technology we provide. Tigasatu only distributes officially registered products, and operates a professional supply chain that has been certified by international and Indonesian instances for distribution best practices.

faqs.question: How can i become a business partner with Tigasatu?
faqs.answer: If you operate or intend to operate a medical device distribution business in a specific part of Indonesia, please contact us for an introduction. Tigasatu encourages independent distributors, freelance resellers and online resellers to become its long-term business partners. If you are an overseas principal looking for a reliable partner to grow your business in Indonesia, please contact us, and we can discuss the best approach to ensure your success.

faqs.question: I want to work at Tigsatu, how?
faqs.answer: Tigasatu is constantly looking for young professionals with strong ethical values and ambition to grow their careers within Tigasatu. Headed by people who have a strong reputation as mentors, Tigasatu offers exciting career opportunities for customer-oriented team players.

timelines.title: Establishment of PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama
timelines.description: Issuance of the establishment deed of PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama.

timelines.title: Partnership with GE
timelines.description: Began USG business by establishing a business relationship with GE for the first time.

timelines.title: Addition of Cardio Business Line
timelines.description: Expanded business scope to include cardio with the distribution of GE ECG products.

timelines.title: Partnership with PT. Djembatan Dua
timelines.description: Started a partnership with PT. Djembatan Dua for the distribution of USG and ECG GE products.

timelines.title: Awarded as Best New Channel Partner – Ultrasound
timelines.description: Received an award as 'Best New Channel Partner – Ultrasound' at the GE event in Singapore on January 24-25.

timelines.title: Addition of Diabetic Business Line and Partnership with Medtronic
timelines.description: Expanded into the diabetes sector to serve the growing number of diabetics in Indonesia and became a distributor of Medtronic for Injection Port and Continuous Glucose Monitor (CGM) products.

timelines.title: Addition of Insulin Pump Product Distribution
timelines.description: Introduced Medtronic's insulin pump products in Indonesia.

timelines.title: Partnership with Boston Scientific
timelines.description: Added to the cardio product portfolio for PCI and ablation procedures by becoming a distributor of Boston Scientific. Distributed PCI products include drug-eluting stents, coronary balloons, and IntraVascular Ultrasound (IVUS). Ablation products include catheters for 2D and 3D ablation procedures.

timelines.title: Partnership with Biotronik
timelines.description: Formed a partnership with Biotronik (Germany) for products such as drug-eluting stents, coronary balloons, drug-coated balloons, aspiration catheters, and covered stents.

timelines.title: Addition of Dental Business Line and Partnership with Mensa Group
timelines.description: Expanded into the dental field and formed a partnership with Mensa Group to distribute various dental products such as dental units, panoramic units, periapical units, and daily consumables for dentists.

timelines.title: Partnership with PT Mentari Murni Mulia
timelines.description: Added state-of-the-art dental products such as those from Kerr, in collaboration with PT Mentari Murni Mulia.

vision.title: T.I.G.A. Principles: The Pillars of Our Ethos and Excellence
vision.subtitle: Embodying Thankfulness, Integrity, Genuineness, and Agility, our core values guide us in forging meaningful relationships and achieving excellence in every endeavor. They are not just values, they are our commitment to growth, trust, authenticity, and adaptability.

values.title: Thankful
values.description: Gratitude to God and stakeholders is a top priority. It encourages the company to be open to feedback in order to continue growing.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: The company's principle is to be committed and consistent in delivering the best service, thereby earning the trust of stakeholders.

values.title: Genuine
values.description: Providing service sincerely and with a clear understanding of what needs to be done, fostering mutual growth.

values.title: Agile
values.description: Possessing the ability to adapt to change, enabling the company to build its business rapidly.

contact.title: Contact Us For General and Further Questions
contact.description: Stay connected with Tigasatumedika. Contact us for general inquiries, press and various other needs.

team.title: Meet Our Team: Dedicated Professionals at Tigasatumedika
team.description: Discover the passionate professionals behind Tigasatumedika. Learn about our team's expertise, experience, and the commitment that drives our success. Get to know the people dedicated to delivering excellence in everything we do.
team.founder_title: Founders and Management of The Company
team.founder_subtitle: Our Founders and Managements is comprised of experienced professionals with a passion for helping others achieve their goals.

founders.name: Hendrik Kianto
founders.title: Founder
founders.bio: MBA, Harvard Business School. Prior experiences include P&G and McKinsey & Co in strategic management & finance. Business interest in steel, food, and distributions.

founders.name: Erwin Tenggono
founders.title: Co-Founder
founders.bio: MBA, Prasetya Mulya Business School. Has 31 years senior executive at healthcare Industry. Sought after speaker on management and organization.

founders.name: Christian Van Schoote
founders.title: Director
founders.bio: MBA, INSEAD. Prior experiences include Director at Delhaize Group, Chief Executive Officer at MAP, Chief Operating Officer at Bhinneka, and Engagement Manager at McKinsey & Co.

team.people_subtitle: We’re a dynamic group of individuals who are passionate about what we do and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.

cta.title: Be Part of the Health Revolution
cta.subtitle: Join us in transforming Indonesia's healthcare. Reach out now and let's make a difference together!

vacancies.subtitle: Embark on a Rewarding Career Journey with Us: Discover Exciting Career Paths, Contribute to Transforming Indonesia's Healthcare Landscape, and Be a Part of Our Mission to Innovate for a Healthier Tomorrow

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.overview: Join our team as a Sales Development Representative where you'll be instrumental in driving our business growth. Your role involves engaging with potential clients, identifying opportunities, and nurturing leads to set the stage for successful sales. You'll harness your communication skills and strategic thinking to create a robust pipeline, contributing directly to our company's success in the competitive healthcare sector.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.overview: As a Software Engineer, you'll play a pivotal role in developing innovative software solutions that advance healthcare technology. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code. Your expertise will be crucial in solving complex technical challenges and delivering high-quality products that make a meaningful impact in the healthcare industry.

cardio.title: Advanced Cardiology and Heart Care Medical Equipment Solutions
cardio.description: Explore cutting-edge cardiology equipment at Tigasatu Medika Pratama. Offering the latest in heart care technology, our solutions are designed for superior patient care and outcomes.

why.label: Why Choose Us
why.title: Advanced Cardiology Solutions for Modern Healthcare
why.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing a satisfying customer experience, and understand that every heartbeat you have is precious.

products.name: Orsiro® Mission DES
products.subtitle: Thinnest Drug-Eluting Stent System Offering Enhanced Deliverability
products.description: Orsiro® Mission is a new drug-eluting stent system that offers advanced deliverability and an ultrathin strut design considered the thinnest available in the United States. It features the same proprietary design and innovative bioabsorbable coating with controlled drug release as the Orsiro stent. Improvements to the new Orsiro Mission DES system include a re-engineered delivery system and a new deep embedding process to improve deliverability further, including ‘best in class’ trackability and crossability

products.name: Pantera® Pro
products.subtitle: Semi-Compliant Workhorse Balloon
products.description: Indicated for dilatation of coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis.* Challenging lesions require a versatile workhorse balloon. Whether it's a tight lesion or a complex bifurcation, Pantera Pro offers the performance to reach, cross and dilate. *Indication: For balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.

products.name: Pantera® LEO
products.subtitle: Low Compliance Coronary Balloon
products.description: For stent post- and pre-dilatation of resistant lesions. With its low compliance and reduced longitudinal balloon growth, Pantera LEO is tailored to stent post- and pre-dilatation of resistant lesions. *Indication: For balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion and for post dilatation of coronary stents.

products.name: Pantera® Lux®
products.subtitle: Paclitaxel-Releasing Balloon
products.description: Indicated for in-stent restenosis, de novo lesions, small vessels and acute occlusions. Expand your universe of treatment options with this clinically proven solution. Using the highly biocompatible BTHC excipient, Pantera® Lux® effectively delivers a proven antiproliferative drug to the lesion site – without leaving an implant behind.

products.name: PK Papyrus®
products.subtitle: Covered Coronary Stent System
products.description: Designed to deliver more like a conventional stent

features.name: After Sales Service
features.description: Our dedicated insulin pump support team is always ready to visit in case of any issues with your insulin pump. We provide comprehensive assistance, troubleshooting, and guidance to ensure your device functions optimally for effective diabetes management.

features.name: WhatsApp Call Center
features.description: Accessible call center services for any inquiries or concerns. Contact us via WhatsApp for prompt and personalized assistance with your diabetes care questions, product information, or any other support you might need.

features.name: Fast Delivery
features.description: Reliable and secure packaging and delivery services. We ensure your diabetes care products are delivered swiftly and safely, maintaining the highest standards of care from our facility to your doorstep.

why.subtitle: Advanced and Personalized Diabetes Management: Integrating Cutting-edge Treatments, Education, and Support for Enhanced Patient Well-being

products.name: Insulin Pump
products.description: An electronic device that automatically delivers insulin into the body. It requires 2 consumables: a reservoir (to store insulin fluid) and an infusion set (a tube to transfer insulin from the pump into the body).

products.name: Continuous Glucose Monitor
products.description: A device for continuous blood glucose monitoring with glucose readings taken at regular intervals.

products.name: I-Port
products.description: An injection port used to reduce the number of direct injections into the body.
